errors.message: "a word" is not a valid number value; must be an integer (ex. "3"), a float (ex. "-0.5"), or a scientific form (ex. "2.1e10")
"--3" is not a valid number value; must be an integer (ex. "3"), a float (ex. "-0.5"), or a scientific form (ex. "2.1e10")
"+" is not a valid number value; must be an integer (ex. "3"), a float (ex. "-0.5"), or a scientific form (ex. "2.1e10")
"3.0.3" is not a valid number value; must be an integer (ex. "3"), a float (ex. "-0.5"), or a scientific form (ex. "2.1e10")
"0xFF" is not a valid number value; must be an integer (ex. "3"), a float (ex. "-0.5"), or a scientific form (ex. "2.1e10")
"2.1e" is not a valid number value; must be an integer (ex. "3"), a float (ex. "-0.5"), or a scientific form (ex. "2.1e10")
"2.1e2.1.1" is not a valid number value; must be an integer (ex. "3"), a float (ex. "-0.5"), or a scientific form (ex. "2.1e10")
